Text_Description_NavigateAndClearStack: Navigate to app main view view and clear the navigation stack, leaving only the main view
Text_NavigateMode_RemoveSelf: The 'Navigation' view was removed from the stack. If you 'go back' now you be redirected to the main view
Text_NavigateMode_Normal: The 'Navigation' view is in the back stack and will be show if you 'go back'
